episodes.title: TikTok Christianity Gets Weird - Ex-Cult Survivor Reacts! | That Liz Hunter
episodes.description:
where are they gonna go when TikTok gets banned?

#thatlizhunter 

Don't miss a video! Subscribe NOW: https://www.youtube.com/c/ThatLizHunter?sub_confirmation=1 

ABOUT LIZ:

Liz is a North Florida-based content creator, former TV news journalist, and full-time social media manager who shares her powerful journey from growing up in a high-control religious cult and foster care to thriving as an advocate, writer, and public speaker. On her YouTube channel and social platforms, Liz offers honest insights on adoption, overcoming trauma, as well as connecting with viewers through candid vlogs, Q&As, and personal stories.

FOLLOW ME ON SOCIAL:
Substack: ttps://thatlizhunter.substack.com/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thatlizhunter/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thatlizhunter?lang=en

Chapters
00:00 Introduction
03:45 How did you do well in school despite trauma?
09:25 Were you encouraged to talk about trauma?
14:55 Have you considered writing a memoir?
17:05 Living with Reactive Attachment Disorder (RAD) as an adult
20:30 Why didn’t social services intervene sooner?
21:35 Did your adoptive parents practice physical discipline?
23:55 Are you still in contact with your siblings? 
26:10 Why not prosecute your great aunt?
31:00 Are your adoptive parents still in IBLP?
33:30 What year was your biological mother born?
34:10 Why not name your great aunt publicly?
35:05 Views on adoption 
38:50 Sassy statement or encouragement 
41:00 Conclusion


Q&A about Adoption, IBLP Cult, and Foster Care | That Liz Hunter
https://www.youtube.com/@ThatLizHunter

episodes.title: the tenacious web of the IBLP Cult
episodes.description:
y'all this was a lot to put together and I hope you enjoy this deep dive! is enjoy the right word? anyway - I spent way too much time over the last 3 weeks thinking about IBLP and I'm ready for a cult breather now 😅 (sources all linked in the bottom of this description)
